.. _desdevelopers:

====================
About the developers
====================

Julie Deshayes is ...

`Nicolas Barrier <http://www.mio.univ-amu.fr/~barrier.n/>`_ is a research
engineer in scientific computing and mathematical modelling for the
OT-Med Labex. His main contribution to |pago| is the adaptation of the 
original Matlab codes to Python and the development of the 
Graphical User Interfaces.

Fran√ßoise Pinsard is a software engineer at LOCEAN.
Her contribution is forge administration, test infrastructure and packaging.
